1.content:
It was a beautiful day, the sun was shining, the bird-Pokémon where singing, and she was hopelessly lost. “Let’s see if I turn right here then the next street should be?” looking at her map Raven ponders her next action, thoughts drifting back to the past.

it had been some time after the final battle against the brotherhood of evil when she had a discussion with her team leader and friend Robin. “is everything alright Raven? You’ve been a bit off lately?”.
“I’m fine Robin.” At her leaders knowing look, the dark titan decides to explain. “sigh alright fine, I’m just feeling a bit of wanderlust that’s all. I guess part of me wants to see what’s out there, but I also don’t want to let down the team by leaving.” “I think I understand.” Robin say’s. “your entire life you had the prophecy hanging over your head, and just when it wasn’t anymore we had that whole mess with the brotherhood, it’s only fair that you get to see the world, you know without some doomsday plot hanging over your head that is.”
Raven was stunned. “You weren’t this understanding when Cyborg left for Titans East?” The boy wonder just shrugged. “My issue with Cyborg wasn’t so much about him leaving as it was about him making the decision without consulting with the rest of us.” Laying a hand on Ravens shoulder Robin gives her a genuine smile. “if you just talk to the team first I am sure we can figure something out.”

As Robin predicted the other Titan’s where pretty understanding about Raven’s desire to travel the world.
Arrangement’s where made and aside from a few bruised ribs curtesy of Starfire’s patented goodbye hug and a few thousand requests for souvenirs from Beast Boy, Raven was soon on her way, which led to her current predicament.
The idea of Pokémon had fascinated her, that differences in the worlds concentration of natural energies could have such a massive impact on evolution was astonishing.
The differences between the lands where Pokémon flourished and where regular animals lived was so drastic it was almost as if she hopped dimensions instead of continents.
Raven thinks it’s a good thing she put the effort into earning that provisional trainer license, all that studying certainly prepared her for operating in these regions…. If she could figure out where she was at least.
Suddenly Raven hears a cry for help, turning towards the noise she sees a black clad figure taking a briefcase from what looks like a professors aide and rushing of. As Raven rushes past the aide she hears him mumble. “No the new starters.” “Call the cops.” She calls out in passing.
Chasing the thief down several alley’s Raven thinks this would have been a lot easier with her powers.

“Dude since when are you a twin?” Rolling her eyes at Beast Boy’s antics Raven say’s. “This is a magical golem I created to help you while I am of traveling, not my twin.” A look of understanding enters Starfire’s eye’s as she responds. “then friend Raven this is like the robotic double Cyborg created for when he infiltrated the evil HIVE.” “Not exactly Starfire, my duplicate will possess all of my memories and abilities along with the bulk of my power, so she will be able to fight and act exactly like me.” “Isn’t that a bit dangerous?” a thoughtful Robin comments, followed by Cyborg. “Yea girl, what if Raven2 decides she likes being you?”

“You act as if she isn’t me.” As this response brings her friends up short Raven continues. “Raven2 as you so elegantly called her is no mere clone, she is a part of me, when I return from my journey the two of us will merge back together and become one again, so there’s no reason for her to even consider betraying me.” “I see you thought this trough, but what about you?” Robin speaks up. “You said you gave her the bulk of your power, don’t you want to keep some for yourself, for emergencies and such?” “I understand your concern Robin, but I believe my powers are best served here.” Raven responds. “The Pokémon regions don’t have supervillains like we have here, and with all that training you put us trough I am confident in my ability to handle any regular thugs I might encounter.” Shaking her head a bit at the turn the conversation has taken Raven looks reassuringly at each of her friends. “it’s not like I will be looking for trouble, I will be fine you guy’s, I promise.”

‘I’m going to get an earful from the guys for his I just know it, but I guess once a hero.’
Raven almost loses sight of the thief as the chase leads to a crowded train station, seeing a flash of black enter a train that’s about to leave the young goth quickly follows before the doors close.
Now trapped in the coupe Raven gets her first good look at the thief, Raven notices the thief is a woman but that’s about all she can tell, hood, scarf and even a pair of sunglasses this girl obviously does not want to be recognized.
“That suitcase does not belong to you, I suggest you hand it over.” The thief just scoffs and suddenly swings the suitcase towards Raven’s head, reflexes honed by crime fighting allow Raven to catch the suitcase in mid-swing starting of a fierce tug-of-war between the two.

Both Raven and the thief seem to be evenly matched when without warning the hinges of the suitcase give forcing both girls to take a step back and sending the case’s contents flying.
Looking up Raven see’s several poke-balls in the air, a quick glance shows her opponent has noticed too and is reaching to catch one, needing to act fast Raven reaches to catch the poke-ball closest to her idly noticing it has a _____symbol on it.
1.title: Beginning of a journey

choices: Charmander.
Cyndaquil.
Torchic.
Chimchar.
Other fire starters.
11.content:
Grasping the Poke-ball in her hand Raven looks to her opponent, just in time to see the black clothed girl call forth the Pokémon from the ball she caught.

In a flash of light an Eevee appears looking ready for battle. ‘That aide mentioned these where starters, Eevee probably thinks that girl is its new trainer.’ Raven thinks. Seeing the thief eying the rest of the Poké Ball’s now scattered throughout the train cabin Raven realizes there’s no time to correct the foxlike creature she must act quickly to protect the other Pokémon.
‘Without my powers out there’s only one option.’ “PREPEARE FOR BATTLE ……..”
11.title: fire starter (gen 1, 2, 3, 4.)

choices: Visit the lab as we are in Pallet Town.
Find a phone and call the professor.
Some other choice
111.content:
Appearing from the poke ball is a small lizard like Pokémon Raven recognizes as the fire-type Pokémon Charmander. ‘Okay since this is a starter he probably does not know any advanced moves or strategy’s, better stick to the basics’ “Eevee use tackle.” The mysterious thief orders leading Eevee to recklessly charge Charmander. “Quick Charmander dodge and use scratch.” What followed was a small but fierce back and forth between the two Pokémon neither getting an edge as they battled across the cabin at their trainers commands. It is then that Raven notices something about Eevee’s movements. ‘It’s dropping its defense when charging, if I can time this just right…..NOW!’ “CHARMANDER DUCK!” responding to his trainers shout the small lizard like Pokémon quickly drops down, causing a charging Eevee to overshoot its target and exposing his flank to Charmander, not missing the opportunity Charmander quickly lays into his opponent with a fierce scratch attack knocking the brown fox like Pokémon out and ending the battle.

The thief lets out a frustrated growl as she returns the unconscious Eevee to its poke ball ‘It’s over, now give up and return the Pokémon you stole.’ The tension in the coupe can almost be cut with a knife, even Charmander seems to have grasped the seriousness of the situation if the glare he’s giving the thief is anything to go by.

The thief seems to cast hidden glances at the other poke-balls spread throughout the coupe and Raven prepares herself for any sudden moves by her oppone “PING, we have arrived at our destination please be careful when exiting the train and thank you for traveling with us.” The sudden announcement along with the opening of the train doors catches Raven of guard, locking eye’s with her masked opponent she sees a myriad of emotions before the mysterious woman turns and flees unto the platform.

Seeing her Pokémon ready to give chase Raven calls out. “Charmander wait! I want to catch her to but right now your fellow Pokémon take priority.” At the fire-type’s nod Raven lets out a sigh of relief, quickly gathering the remaining poke-balls and scattered papers titan and Pokémon soon find themselves standing on the platform.

“Now let’s see, the aid that was transporting you said you belonged to a professor, since where in Kanto I assume he meant professor Oak?” At Charmander’s nod of conformation Raven says. “Alright then I think our next move should be….”
111.title: Charmander.

choices: Find a hotel its getting late.
See if we can pick up the thief’s trail.
Something else.

Appearing from the poke ball is a small green Pokémon Raven recognizes as the grass-type Pokémon Chikorita. ‘Okay since this is a starter he probably does not know any advanced moves or strategy’s, better stick to the basics’ “Eevee use tackle.” The mysterious thief orders leading Eevee to recklessly charge Chikorita. “Quick Chikorita dodge and use tackle too.” What followed was a small but fierce back and forth between the two Pokémon neither getting an edge as they battled across the cabin at their trainers commands. It is then that Raven notices something about Eevee’s movements. ‘It’s dropping its defense when charging, if I can time this just right…..NOW!’ “CHIKORITA DUCK!” responding to his trainers shout the leafheaded Pokémon quickly drops down, causing a charging Eevee to overshoot its target and exposing his flank to Chikorita, not missing the opportunity Chikorita quickly lays into his opponent with a fierce tackle knocking the brown fox like Pokémon out and ending the battle.

The thief lets out a frustrated growl as she returns the unconscious Eevee to its poke ball ‘It’s over, now give up and return the Pokémon you stole.’ The tension in the coupe can almost be cut with a knife, even Chikorita seems to have grasped the seriousness of the situation if the glare he’s giving the thief is anything to go by.

The thief seems to cast hidden glances at the other poke-balls spread throughout the coupe and Raven prepares herself for any sudden moves by her oppone “PING, we have arrived at our destination please be careful when exiting the train and thank you for traveling with us.” The sudden announcement along with the opening of the train doors catches Raven of guard, locking eye’s with her masked opponent she sees a myriad of emotions before the mysterious woman turns and flees unto the platform.

Seeing her Pokémon ready to give chase Raven calls out. “Chikorita wait! I want to catch her to but right now your fellow Pokémon take priority.” At the grass-type’s nod Raven lets out a sigh of relief, quickly gathering the remaining poke-balls and scattered papers titan and Pokémon soon find themselves standing on the platform.

“Now let’s see, the aid that was transporting you said you belonged to a professor, since where in Johto I assume he meant professor Elm?” At Chikorita’s nod of conformation Raven says. “Alright then I think our next move should be….”

125.content:
The ball with the leaf symbol.

Grasping the Poke-ball in her hand Raven looks to her opponent, just in time to see the black clothed girl call forth the Pokémon from the ball she caught.

In a flash of light an Eevee appears looking ready for battle. ‘That aide mentioned these where starters, Eevee probably thinks that girl is its new trainer.’ Raven thinks. Seeing the thief eying the rest of the Poké Ball’s now scattered throughout the train cabin Raven realizes there’s no time to correct the foxlike creature she must act quickly to protect the other Pokémon.
‘Without my powers out there’s only one option.’ “PREPEARE FOR BATTLE ……..”

It is then that Raven notices something about Eevee’s movements. ‘It’s dropping its defense when charging, if I can time this just right…..NOW!’ “OSHAWOTT DUCK!” responding to his trainers shout the small sea otter like Pokémon quickly drops down, causing a charging Eevee to overshoot its target and exposing his flank to Oshawott, not missing the opportunity Oshawott quickly lays into his opponent with a fierce tackle knocking the brown fox like Pokémon out and ending the battle.

The thief lets out a frustrated growl as she returns the unconscious Eevee to its poke ball ‘It’s over, now give up and return the Pokémon you stole.’ The tension in the coupe can almost be cut with a knife, even Oshawott seems to have grasped the seriousness of the situation if the glare he’s giving the thief is anything to go by.

The thief seems to cast hidden glances at the other poke-balls spread throughout the coupe and Raven prepares herself for any sudden moves by her oppone “PING, we have arrived at our destination please be careful when exiting the train and thank you for traveling with us.” The sudden announcement along with the opening of the train doors catches Raven of guard, locking eye’s with her masked opponent she sees a myriad of emotions before the mysterious woman turns and flees unto the platform.

Seeing her Pokémon ready to give chase Raven calls out. “Oshawott wait! I want to catch her to but right now your fellow Pokémon take priority.” At the water-type’s nod Raven lets out a sigh of relief, quickly gathering the remaining poke-balls and scattered papers titan and Pokémon soon find themselves standing on the platform.

“Now let’s see, the aid that was transporting you said you belonged to a professor, since where in Unova I assume he meant professor Juniper?” At Oshawott’s nod of conformation Raven says. “Alright then I think our next move should be….”
1351.title: Oshawott

Something else.

1353.content:
The ball with the raindrop symbol.

Grasping the Poke-ball in her hand Raven looks to her opponent, just in time to see the black clothed girl call forth the Pokémon from the ball she caught.

In a flash of light an Eevee appears looking ready for battle. ‘That aide mentioned these where starters, Eevee probably thinks that girl is its new trainer.’ Raven thinks. Seeing the thief eying the rest of the Poké Ball’s now scattered throughout the train cabin Raven realizes there’s no time to correct the foxlike creature she must act quickly to protect the other Pokémon.
‘Without my powers out there’s only one option.’ “PREPEARE FOR BATTLE ……..”

info.brief_description: Join Raven from Teen Titan's as she travels the Pokemon world.
info.description:
Premisis of the story: Raven from the Teen Titans 2003 series grows restles sometime after the series end, and decides to travel the pokemon world.

Thing's to know:

In this interactive Teen Titans and Pokemon exist in the same world, pokemon having evolved and settled on continents with high concentrations of natural energy while lands with low natural energy sport normal animals or none at all.

Customs between the pokemon and Titan world's is very strict, so travel between them is difficult.

Raven travels with her friends consent.

Thanks to the strict customs the other Titan's cant simply pop in for a visit, Raven can call them though.

Raven picked up a trainers license so while still a rookie she knows the basics of pokemon training.

Before coming to the pokemon continent Raven placed the majority of her powers into a golem that would help her friends while she traveled, as such Raven's powers (at the beginning at least.) are extremely limited.

Current rating is E if chapter's whose content surpasses this rating are posted I will up the rating accordenly.

And the most important thing to remember, Have fun.
